name: ChocoBreak
description:
Why not take a break, and smash some tasty chocolate bricks? A single finger is enough to steer the paddle and bounce the ball. Show your friends who's the most greedy.

- Chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, apricot, raspberry and blueberry flavored graphics
- Retro sound atmosphere for the nostalgic
- 100% sugar free
- Doesn't cause cavities

ARE YOU CREATIVE?
Find out if you are, by learning how to create this game. Check out our free software, follow our step-by-step tutorial and build this game in a few hours!
Would you like to know more? Visit http://www.clickteam.com/creation_materials/tutorials/chocobreakhd/en/part1/
